---

This cloudy, white liquid helps protect against [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126). When you drink an _antivenom potion_, you can immediately attempt a DC 10 flat check to end any [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) you're taking. In addition, for 1 minute after drinking the potion, you gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws to avoid taking persistent poison damage.
